nodes.text: Medcha Wanto was a male Talz who lived on Orto Plutonia during the Clone Wars and the scribe to his chieftain, Thi-Sen.

When the Jedi Knights Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi arrived at the Talz village to investigate the attack on the Republic outpost, they were greeted by Thi-Sen, who invited them to his hut, where Medcha Wanto helped him communicate with Jedi by scratching images on the pieces of skin of an animal. Using these primitive form of communications, the Jedi organized a meeting for Thi-Sen and Pantoran representatives. Despite the short but violent conflict, that broke afterwards, the Jedi were able to settle peace between Talz and Pantorans with the help of the young Senator Riyo Chuchi, allowing Thi-Sen and his clan to live in peace.
